Class Raytracer.Plane

  • java.lang.Object
    • Raytracer.JSONSerializable
      • Raytracer.SceneObject
        • Raytracer.Plane
  • Enclosing class:
    Raytracer

    class Raytracer.Plane
extends Raytracer.SceneObject
    Represents a one-sided infinite plane. The plane is only visible from the side that the normal vector points toward.

      • rayIntersect

        public float rayIntersect​(Raytracer.Ray ray)
        Description copied from class: Raytracer.SceneObject
        Determines if and where the given ray intersects this object. Will return a value <= 0 if ray does not intersect this object.
        Specified by:
        rayIntersect in class Raytracer.SceneObject
        Parameters:
        ray - the ray to be tested for intersection.
        Returns:
        the value of t at which the ray hits this object.
